descriptionHtml:
Legacy Of Gronaak-100% Complete Savegame With Both Dawnguard Paths Completed
===============================================================================
Description:
------------------
This Is My 100% Completed Skyrim Save Which Contains:
*A Level 30+ Orc Character
*Three Revisions Of The Orc Character With Dawnguard And Vampire Sides Completed And Vanila Versions For Those Without Dawnguard 
*Guild Main Quests(Mages Guild,Thieves Guild,Companions And Dark Brotherhood) Completed
*Main Storyline Completed With All Available Shouts Unlocked Completely(Including Soul Cairn Dragon And Soul Tear Shouts Unlocked)
*Life Time Supply Of Septims On The Character
*All Abilities And Perks Maxed(Except For New Werewolf And Vampire Lord Trees)

Installation:
----------------
Place The Downloaded Saves Folder Into Your My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim
Folder.

Have Fun :)
